verses.verse: If there be therefore any <WG1536> <WG3767> consolation <WG3874> in <WG1722> Christ, <WG5547> if any <WG1536> comfort <WG3890> of love, <WG26> if any <WG1536> fellowship <WG2842> of the Spirit, <WG4151> if any <WG1536> bowels <WG4698> and <WG2532> mercies, <WG3628>

Fulfill <WG4137> ye my <WG3450> joy, <WG5479> that <WG2443> ye be likeminded, <WG5426> <WG846> having <WG2192> the <WG3588> same <WG846> love, <WG26> being of one accord, <WG4861> of one <WG1520> mind. <WG5426>

Let nothing <WG3367> be done through <WG2596> strife <WG2052> or <WG2228> vainglory; <WG2754> but <WG235> in lowliness of mind <WG5012> let each esteem other <WG240> <WG2233> better <WG5242> than themselves. <WG1438>
Look <WG4648> not <WG3361> every man <WG1538> on his own things, <WG1438> but <WG235> every man <WG1538> also <WG2532> on the things of others. <WG2087>
<WG1063> Let this mind be <WG5426> <WG5124> in <WG1722> you, <WG5213> which <WG3739> was also <WG2532> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus: <WG2424>
Who, <WG3739> being <WG5225> in <WG1722> the form <WG3444> of God, <WG2316> thought <WG2233> it not <WG3756> robbery <WG725> to be <WG1511> equal <WG2470> with God: <WG2316>

But <WG235> made himself of no reputation, <WG2758> <WG1438> and took <WG2983> upon him the form <WG3444> of a servant, <WG1401> and was made <WG1096> in <WG1722> the likeness <WG3667> of men: <WG444>

And <WG2532> being found <WG2147> in fashion <WG4976> as <WG5613> a man, <WG444> he humbled <WG5013> himself, <WG1438> and became <WG1096> obedient <WG5255> unto <WG3360> death, <WG2288> even <WG1161> the death <WG2288> of the cross. <WG4716>

Wherefore <WG1352> God <WG2316> also <WG2532> hath highly exalted <WG5251> him, <WG846> and <WG2532> given <WG5483> him <WG846> a name <WG3686> which <WG3588> is above <WG5228> every <WG3956> name: <WG3686>

That <WG2443> at <WG1722> the <WG3588> name <WG3686> of Jesus <WG2424> every <WG3956> knee <WG1119> should bow, <WG2578> of things in heaven, <WG2032> and <WG2532> things in earth, <WG1919> and <WG2532> things under the earth; <WG2709>

And <WG2532> that every <WG3956> tongue <WG1100> should confess <WG1843> that <WG3754> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> is Lord, <WG2962> to <WG1519> the glory <WG1391> of God <WG2316> the Father. <WG3962>

Wherefore, <WG5620> my <WG3450> beloved, <WG27> as <WG2531> ye have always <WG3842> obeyed, <WG5219> not <WG3361> as <WG5613> in <WG1722> my <WG3450> presence <WG3952> only, <WG3440> but <WG235> now <WG3568> much <WG4183> more <WG3123> in <WG1722> my <WG3450> absence, <WG666> work out <WG2716> your own <WG1438> salvation <WG4991> with <WG3326> fear <WG5401> and <WG2532> trembling. <WG5156>
For <WG1063> it is <WG2076> God <WG2316> which worketh <WG1754> in <WG1722> you <WG5213> both <WG2532> to will <WG2309> and <WG2532> to do <WG1754> of his <WG5228> good pleasure. <WG2107>
Do <WG4160> all things <WG3956> without <WG5565> murmurings <WG1112> and <WG2532> disputings: <WG1261>

That <WG2443> ye may be <WG1096> blameless <WG273> and <WG2532> harmless, <WG185> the sons <WG5043> of God, <WG2316> without rebuke, <WG298> in <WG1722> the midst <WG3319> of a crooked <WG4646> and <WG2532> perverse <WG1294> nation, <WG1074> among <WG1722> whom <WG3739> ye shine <WG5316> as <WG5613> lights <WG5458> in <WG1722> the world; <WG2889>

Holding forth <WG1907> the word <WG3056> of life; <WG2222> that <WG3754> I <WG1698> may rejoice <WG1519> <WG2745> in <WG1519> the day <WG2250> of Christ, <WG5547> that <WG3754> I have not <WG3756> run <WG5143> in <WG1519> vain, <WG2756> neither <WG3761> labored <WG2872> in <WG1519> vain. <WG2756>

Yea, <WG235> and if <WG1499> I be offered <WG4689> upon <WG1909> the <WG3588> sacrifice <WG2378> and <WG2532> service <WG3009> of your <WG5216> faith, <WG4102> I joy, <WG5463> and <WG2532> rejoice with <WG4796> you <WG5213> all. <WG3956>
<WG1161> For the <WG3588> same cause <WG846> also <WG2532> do ye <WG5210> joy, <WG5463> and <WG2532> rejoice with <WG4796> me. <WG3427>

But <WG1161> I trust <WG1679> in <WG1722> the Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> to send <WG3992> Timothy <WG5095> shortly <WG5030> unto you, <WG5213> that <WG2443> I also <WG2504> may be of good comfort, <WG2174> when I know <WG1097> your state. <WG4012> <WG5216>
For <WG1063> I have <WG2192> no man <WG3762> likeminded, <WG2473> who <WG3748> will naturally <WG1104> care <WG3309> for your state. <WG4012> <WG5216>
For <WG1063> all <WG3956> seek <WG2212> their own, <WG1438> not <WG3756> the things <WG3588> which are Jesus <WG2424> Christ's. <WG5547>

But <WG1161> ye know <WG1097> the <WG3588> proof <WG1382> of him, <WG846> that, <WG3754> as <WG5613> a son <WG5043> with the father, <WG3962> he hath served <WG1398> with <WG4862> me <WG1698> in <WG1519> the <WG3588> gospel. <WG2098>
Him <WG5126> therefore <WG3767> I hope <WG1679> to send <WG3992> presently, <WG1824> so soon as <WG5613> I shall see <WG542> <WG302> how it will go with <WG4012> me. <WG1691>
But <WG1161> I trust <WG3982> in <WG1722> the Lord <WG2962> that <WG3754> I also <WG2532> myself <WG846> shall come <WG2064> shortly. <WG5030>

Yet <WG1161> I supposed <WG2233> it necessary <WG316> to send <WG3992> to <WG4314> you <WG5209> Epaphroditus, <WG1891> my <WG3450> brother, <WG80> and <WG2532> companion in labor, <WG4904> and <WG2532> fellow soldier, <WG4961> but <WG1161> your <WG5216> messenger, <WG652> and <WG2532> he that ministered <WG3011> to my <WG3450> wants. <WG5532>
For <WG1894> he longed after <WG2258> <WG1971> you <WG5209> all, <WG3956> and <WG2532> was full of heaviness, <WG85> because <WG1360> that ye had heard <WG191> that <WG3754> he had been sick. <WG770>

For <WG1063> indeed <WG2532> he was sick <WG770> nigh unto <WG3897> death: <WG2288> but <WG235> God <WG2316> had mercy <WG1653> on him; <WG846> and <WG1161> not <WG3756> on him <WG846> only, <WG3440> but <WG235> on me <WG1691> also, <WG2532> lest <WG3363> I should have <WG2192> sorrow <WG3077> upon <WG1909> sorrow. <WG3077>

I sent <WG3992> him <WG846> therefore <WG3767> the more carefully, <WG4708> that, <WG2443> when ye see <WG1492> him <WG846> again, <WG3825> ye may rejoice, <WG5463> and that I <WG2504> may be <WG5600> the less sorrowful. <WG253>
Receive <WG4327> him <WG846> therefore <WG3767> in <WG1722> the Lord <WG2962> with <WG3326> all <WG3956> gladness; <WG5479> and <WG2532> hold <WG2192> such <WG5108> in reputation: <WG1784>

Because <WG3754> for <WG1223> the <WG3588> work <WG2041> of Christ <WG5547> he was nigh <WG1448> unto <WG3360> death, <WG2288> not regarding <WG3851> his life, <WG5590> to <WG2443> supply <WG378> your <WG5216> lack <WG5303> of service <WG3009> toward <WG4314> me. <WG3165>
